snippet: Veronica M. White, the new commissioner of the Department of Parks and Recreation, has set out to solidify the capital projects and initiatives undertaken in the past decade.
abstract: Profile of Veronica M White, appointed as New York City's Parks and Recreation Dept commissioner.
lead_paragraph: Veronica M. White, the new commissioner of the Department of Parks and Recreation, has set out to solidify the capital projects and initiatives undertaken in the past decade.

headline.seo: City’s New Parks Chief, Veronica M. White, Is Voice for Expansion
headline.main: New Parks Chief Is a Voice for Expansion
headline.print_headline: New Parks Chief Is a Voice for Expansion
